data.name: Download_Desktop_Content
data.value: With the Power BI Desktop you can visually explore your data through a free-form drag-and-drop canvas, a broad range of modern data visualizations, and an easy-to-use report authoring experience.

data.name: Download_Desktop_Cta
data.value: Learn more

data.name: Download_Desktop_Heading
data.value: Microsoft Power BI Desktop

data.name: Download_Gateway_Content
data.value: With Power BI gateways, you can keep your data fresh by connecting to on-premises data sources. The gateways provide the flexibility you need to meet individual needs, and the needs of your organization.

data.name: Download_Gateway_Cta
data.value: Learn more

data.name: Download_Gateway_Heading
data.value: Microsoft Power BI Gateway

data.name: Download_Mobile_Content
data.value: Access your data anywhere, anytime. These native apps provide live, interactive, mobile access to your important business information.

data.name: Download_Mobile_Cta
data.value: Learn more

data.name: Download_Mobile_Heading
data.value: Microsoft Power BI Mobile

data.name: Hero_Content2
data.value: Power BI transforms your company's data into rich visuals for you to collect and organize so you can focus on what matters to you.

data.name: Hero_Cta
data.value: Get started free

data.name: Hero_Heading2
data.value: Bring your data to life

data.name: InsightsSummit_Content
data.value: Join us at the Microsoft Data Insights Summit, June 12 – 13, 2017 in Seattle, WA. Register now!

data.name: InsightsSummit_Cta
data.value: Watch now

data.name: META_DESCRIPTION
data.value: See your company's data in new ways with interactive data visualization BI tools from Microsoft Power BI.

data.name: META_KEYWORDS
data.value: interactive data, data visualization, data visualization tools, power bi, microsoft power bi, bi tools, microsoft bi

data.name: META_PAGETITLE
data.value: Power BI | Interactive Data Visualization BI Tools

data.name: NationalCloud_Content_1
data.value: Power BI is available in three separate national clouds. These clouds offer the same levels of security, privacy, compliance and transparency as the global version of Power BI, combined with a unique model for local regulations on service delivery, data residency, access, and control.

data.name: NationalCloud_Cta
data.value: Learn more

data.name: NationalCloud_Heading
data.value: Microsoft National Clouds

data.name: Possibile_Content
data.value: From Finance to Sales to Operations (and more), Power BI makes it easy for your department to unite your data and share new insights. View our report showcase to see how Power BI can be a part of your team.

data.name: Possibile_Cta
data.value: See it in action

data.name: Possibile_Heading
data.value: See what's possible with Power BI

data.name: Quote
data.value: Linking data for analyses was something we couldn’t do before. With Power BI, it’s simple. Power BI makes the hard things easy. Everything becomes possible.

data.name: Quote_Author
data.value: Philip Dean, Head of Department of Pharmacy and Quality Control North Tees and Hartlepool National Health Services Trust

data.name: UsingPowerBi_Heading
data.value: See who's using Power BI

data.name: Visualize_Content
data.value: In less than five minutes you can start creating personalized dashboards and reports on your data using natural language and drag-and-drop gestures to find answers to your most important questions.

data.name: Visualize_Heading
data.value: Visualize and analyze everything in one place

data.name: WhatIsPowerBI_Content
data.value: Power BI is a suite of business analytics tools to analyze data and share insights. Monitor your business and get answers quickly with rich dashboards available on every device.

data.name: WhatIsPowerBI_Cta
data.value: Learn more

data.name: WhatIsPowerBI_Heading
data.value: What is Power BI?
